Quotes.quote: Life’s simple. You make choices and you don’t look back
Quotes.movie_title: The Fast and The Furious: Tokyo Drift
Quotes.author: Sung Kang
Quotes.author_bio: Kang was born in Clarkston, Georgia, to South Korean immigrant parents. He was raised by his Korean mother and African American stepfather in Gainesville, Georgia.He moved to Barstow, California, while in high school.
